p: We found significant differences in average daily temperature by year and by season, suggesting there may be variability in seasonal conditions year-to-year, which is in concordance with other regional climate analyses [ 21]. Specifically, we observed significant increases in temperature on a short time scale [ 47]. We did not observe an effect of year on precipitation in this study period; however, longer periods may show a change in precipitation patterns in the future. Since seasons were defined by historical precipitation patterns [ 22], the main effect of season on rainfall was expected.
